bioconda.name: bioconductor-nnnorm
bioconda.summary: Spatial and intensity based normalization of cDNA microarray data based on robust neural nets

biotools.summary: This package allows to detect and correct for spatial and intensity biases with two-channel microarray data. The normalization method implemented in this package is based on robust neural networks fitting.

bioschemas.name: nnNorm
bioschemas.summary: This package allows to detect and correct for spatial and intensity biases with two-channel microarray data. The normalization method implemented in this package is based on robust neural networks fitting.
